DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether the study drug is safe and effective
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety Study for an Oral Contraceptive Containing Folate
DOC.detailed_description: Acronym is used in result section: suspected/diagnosed (susp/diag)
DOC.criteria: Healthy women between 18 and 40 requesting oral contraception The use of steroidal oral contraceptives, or any drug that could alter Oral Contraception metabolism will be prohibited during the study
